content: Hi folks! Arrived here from a company Hackathon this week and looking forward to working on my first Rust contribution to OSS. I've done a good amount of reading and a small amount of dabbling with Rust. It's my first systems/non-GC language and has been quite interesting to learn. I have lofty ambitions of writing a TTRPG rule based video game using the bevy engine in Rust. Thank for having me here!

Hi everyone,

I've spent a month learning Rust in my spare time and I'm here to participate in the Rust Code Reading club, find open source projects (with kind maintainers and mentors) I can contribute to, get ideas for projects to embark on, and to generally have fun learning and building with Rust.
